content:
IDisk Interface

Definition

An immutable client-side representation of an Azure managed disk.

In this Article

public interface IDisk : Microsoft.Azure.Management.ResourceManager.Fluent.Core.IGroupableResource<Microsoft.Azure.Management.Compute.Fluent.IComputeManager,Microsoft.Azure.Management.Compute.Fluent.Models.DiskInner>, Microsoft.Azure.Management.ResourceManager.Fluent.Core.IHasInner<Microsoft.Azure.Management.Compute.Fluent.Models.DiskInner>, Microsoft.Azure.Management.ResourceManager.Fluent.Core.IHasManager<Microsoft.Azure.Management.Compute.Fluent.IComputeManager>, Microsoft.Azure.Management.ResourceManager.Fluent.Core.ResourceActions.IRefreshable<Microsoft.Azure.Management.Compute.Fluent.IDisk>, Microsoft.Azure.Management.ResourceManager.Fluent.Core.ResourceActions.IUpdatable<Microsoft.Azure.Management.Compute.Fluent.Disk.Update.IUpdate>

Properties

CreationMethod

Gets the disk creation method.
IsAttachedToVirtualMachine

Gets true if the disk is attached to a virtual machine, false if is in detached state.
OsType

Gets the type of operating system in the disk.
SizeInGB

Gets disk size in GB.
Sku

Gets the disk sku.
Source

Gets the details of the source from which disk is created.
VirtualMachineId

Gets resource id of the virtual machine this disk is attached to, null if the disk is in detached state.

Methods

GrantAccess(Int32)

Grants access to the disk.
RevokeAccess()

Revoke access granted to the disk.
